unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments are so interesting! My nani swears by them. She visits Kerala every year for Panchakarma. Always comes back glowing. Heard good things about the Arya Vaidya Sala too. Has anyone tried it? Planning a trip during Onam, maybe I can squeeze in some abhyanga. And definitely biryani after! :) Gotta balance the wellness with the yummy!
